pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 7, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario  

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, the Honourable Dennis King.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a gathering with national caucus members. 

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Closed to media.
